channel.title: Minor Piston Glitch - c2a3b - Apprehension
channel.description:
I was curious and tried to lodge a barrel between the pistons and see what would happen. It completely halted the piston, and made me unable to complete the level. I tried jumping into the piston, and it instantly killed me. [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/92958754/bm_c2a3b0000.jpg[/img] [b]Getpos Info:[/b] setpos 1278.192017 -628.158630 247.829697;setang 14.290766 -4.386720 0.062573
[b]Mapname:[/b] bm_c2a3b
